name: APESHIT (Flaffys)
description:
Aren't you tired of being nice, don't you just wanna go apeshit.

Play as a rampaging gorilla who throws anything he can at people.

Made for MITS IXS Gamejam 2022

IF THE R TO RESTART BUTTON DOES NOT WORK THEN CLOSE THE GAME AND REOPEN

CONTROLS:

WASD - TO MOVE

LEFT CLICK - TO THROW ITEMS

TO PICKUP ITEMS, WALK OVER THEM

Credits:

Programmer - Pelle Holden

Art and animation - Kadi Allas-Laumets

Art - Tähe Leen Metsoja

Music - Marco Neeme
